item.value: Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing the first telephone in 1876.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
House flies have a lifespan of two weeks.
The Universe is about 14 billion years old. The earth is young in comparison, it is only 4.6 billion years old.
The Cambodian alphabet is the world's largest alphabet, with 74 letters.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world. It covers about 1/3 of its surface. It is 155.557 million sq km.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
The 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics was won by Albert Einstein for his work in the field of theoretical physics.
On average, Elephants sleep for about 2 hours per day.
The Sputnik 1, launched on October 4, 1957 by Russia, was the first human-made object to orbit the Earth.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world. It is 8850 meters (29035ft) high.
Drinking too much water too quickly can lead to water intoxication which causes an imbalance of water in the brain
Mount McKinley in Alaska in the highest mountain in America. It is 20,320 ft high.
There are 9 planets that circle the sun. They are divided into two groups: the inner planets (Mercury, Venus,Earth, and Mars) and the outer planets (Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, and Pluto).
The shortest woman was Pauline Muster. She was 58 cm ( 23 in ) tall.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world. It is 8850 meters (29035ft) high.
China has more than 350 million telephones, the most of any other country. The United States is second with 268 million.
John Logie Baird was the inventor of the world's first working television system in Hastings, England in 1923.
English is the second most spoken language in the world.
The blue whale can produce sounds up to 188 decibels. This is the loudest sound produced by a living animal and has been detected as far away as 530 miles.
